name: IOUserHIDEventService
desc: A service that parses HID report data into elements that you can use to dispatch events.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Handles the basic initialization of the event service.

items.name: - Start
items.desc: Starts the current event service and associates it with the specified provider object.

items.name: - handleStart
items.desc: Performs additional initialization during the startup of the event service.

items.name: - Stop
items.desc: Stops the event service associated with the specified provider.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the service.

items.name: - getElements
items.desc: Returns an array of elements that contain the parsed data from the HID device's report.

items.name: - handleReport
items.desc: Converts an incoming device report into dispatchable events.

items.name: - ReportAvailable
items.desc: Notifies the event service that an updated report is available from the HID device.

items.name: - dispatchDigitizerStylusEvent
items.desc: Dispatches a digitizer stylus event to the system.

items.name: - dispatchDigitizerTouchEvent
items.desc: Dispatches a digitizer touch event to the system.

items.name: - conformsTo
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the service conforms to the specified HID usage and page information.

items.name: - dispatchEvent
items.desc: Dispatches a HID event to the system.
